/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/23.9/cuda/12.2/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_52,code=[compute_52,sm_52] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/include/api/MSz.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/include/internal/MSz.cu.o CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/include/internal/MSz_globals.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/include/internal/MSz_cpu.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/include/internal/internal.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/include/internal/MSz_omp.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/MSz.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/23.9/cuda/12.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/23.9/cuda/12.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
